member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_DESC
member.summary: Describes a parameter to a meta command.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_DESC.RequiredResourceState
member.summary: A specifying the expected state of a resource parameter.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_DESC.StructureOffset
member.summary: The 4-byte aligned offset for this parameter, within the structure containing the parameter values, which you pass when creating/initializing/executing the meta command, as appropriate.
